Title: Prohibits certain chain pharmacies from establishing quotas for duties performed by pharmacists and pharmacy technicians
Summary: Prohibits publicly traded pharmacies with twenty or more stores in this state from establishing or enforcing quotas for duties performed by pharmacists and pharmacy technicians, including evaluating or measuring the number of prescriptions filled, services rendered, programs offered and revenue obtained.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting certain chain pharmacies from establishing quotas for duties performed by pharmacists and pharmacy technicians
